unnormalised: Okay, mhunnlear konnem Bangalore-ant Christ University-chea lagim ek boro PG sodunk vicharlem, barobar? Mhojekui sodtoleponn khup vell laglo, ani online-chi suchi? Purnn dokeddi. Odhiktemponn, thikan thoddech “Christ University-chea lagim” – upkari, *nhui*.
normalised: Okay, mhunnllear Bangalore-ant Christ University-chea laginch ek boro P-G sodchea vishayant konnem-i tor vicharlem, barabor? Mhaka sodthanastana tem sodunk khoob vell laglo, ani online listings? Purem dokeddi. Addech velar, patto "Christ University-chea laginch" aslo – upkaranth, na.

unnormalised: Mhaka ek zago ugddasso asa, suchinent “Forum Mall, Koramangala-chea fattim” mhunn asllem. Bori suvath, khachi, punn *khorelem* thikan kashen “Bldg No. 27, 3rd Cross Rd, Off Hosur Rd, Koramangala 560095” aslem. Google Maps-an mhojek tenktan gol ghallo! Ani ek aniui kharap aslem. Jahiratin “Opp. Jyoti Nivas College” mhunn ullekh kel'lo. To PG aslien “No. 14, 1st Main, Austin Town, Bangalore 560047”-an aslo – sumar 15 minute-chem auto-chem palli!
normalised: Mhaka ek zago ugddapta, listing-ant mhunntlem "Forum Mall, Koramangala-chea fattim". Bori suvat, khachi, punn aslolo patto "Building Number twenty seven, third Cross Road, Off Hosur Road, Koramangala five six zero zero nine five" kitem-i tor aslem. Google Maps-an mhaka bhonvddaile! Dusrem voirdikuch aslem. Advertisment-an mhunntlem "Opposite Jyoti Nivas College". Pollelear P-G khoreaninch "Number fourteen, first Main, Austin Town, Bangalore five six zero zero four seven" - boro pandhra minute-ancho auto ride pois aslem!

unnormalised: Uprant asle te PG-i jem matiek ani PIN code-i ditale. Kashen, "Dairy Circle-chea lagim, 560076". Kashen, ganbhiriponn? Dairy Circle mhunnlear voddlem! Tumkam imarat-chem nanv vo ek borea rastyachem thikan zai. Hanven ekea brokrak phone kela, ani tannem mhaka “HRBR Layout, 2nd Block” ditolo. HRBR Layout mhunnlear apunnuch ek lhan xar! To mhunnlo, "Just ieiet, hanv tumkam dakhoi". Hoi, naka dhanyavad.
normalised: Ani thodde P-G-ni fokot ek landmark ani P-I-N code dil'lo. "Near Dairy Circle, five six zero zero seven six" kitem-i tor. Mhunnllear, khoreaninch? Dairy Circle vhoddlo asa! Tuka building-achem nav vo ek boro street address zai. Hanvem ek broker-ak phone korunkui prayatn kelo, ani tannem mhaka fokot "H-R-B-R Layout, second Block" dilem. H-R-B-R Layout mhunnllear ek lhan shahar. To mhunntlo, "Fokot ye, hanv tuka dakoytam". Ho, dhanyavad na.

unnormalised: Bangalore-chea thikan-naka-chem margdarshan korunk hanvem sodhlea kaxean bori vatt mhunnlear vidhyarthyank vicharop. Tankam PG-anchem khorem, purnn thikan mahit asta – "House No. 12A, 4th Ln, Teacher's Colony, Bangalore 560034" prakaranchem. Tumi khup vell ani tana vattaitat. Uprant, te tumkam suvath-achea vixheant khorea goshtti sangta, fakt online suchi sangta tea poros.
normalised: Bangalore-chea address system-an marg dakhounk mhaka mell'lolo boro marg mhunntllear extant students-ank vicharunk. Tankam sadharan-ni P-G-nche aslile, pure patte mahit astat - "House Number twelve A, fourth Lane, Teacher's Colony, Bangalore five six zero zero three four" toranche vostu. Tuka khoob vell ani kanto vatovta. Addik, tankam tumkam zageache vishayant khari khobor ditat, fokot online listing sangta tem nhoy.

unnormalised: Sat'tyen, Bangalore-ant ek PG sodunk mhunnlear ek koddi sodouncheaxem. Bori kismet, tumkam zai poddttoli! Ani sodanch, *sodanch* bhonvkerek vochunk vixar korchea adim purnn thikanchi don pauti zatka korat. Fakt “Christ University-chea lagim” vo ek dhumallechea matiecher vixvas dovrunk naka. Tumi bhomvteponnan vell ghalouncheak sampoddtat.
normalised: Sotam sanglear, Bangalore-ant ek P-G sodunk mhunnllear ek gupt zago sodunk sarkhem. Borem nasib, tumkam tem zai astolem! Ani sadanch, sadanch bhonvddauchem poilim pure patte poriksha kor. Fokot "Near Christ University" vo nirarthak landmark-acher aadharit ravona. Tum bhonvddaun vell watovtele.
